docs.title: Normal words in Japanese
docs.text: Goodnight = Oyasuminasai Good morning (formal) = Ohayou Gozaimasu Good afternoon = konnichiwa Excuse me, sorry = Sumimasen How do you do , (nice to meet you) = Hajimemashte Douzo Youroshku Good evening = Kombamwa Thank you (formal) = Arigato Gozaimasu

docs.title: Counting in Japanese
docs.text:
1 - Ichi 2 - Ni 3 - San 4 - Yon 5 - Go 6 - Roku 7 - Nana 8 - Hachi 9 - Kyuu 10 - Jyuu 11 = 10+1 :- Jyuu Ichi 12 = 10+2 :- Jyuu Ni 13 = 10+3 :- Jyuu San 14 = 10+4 :- Jyuu Go . . .

*For 20, 30, 40, 50, 60, 70, 80, 90 :- Use this logic 20=2 * 10 = Ni Jyuu 30=3 * 10= San Jyuu 40=4 * 10 = Yon Jyuu 50=5 * 10 = GO Jyuu 60=6 * 10 = Roku Jyuu 70=7 * 10 = Nana Jyuu 80=8 * 10 = Hachi Jyuu 90=9 * 10 = Kyuu Jyuu 100 = Hyaku (Exception : Learn it)

For the days of the week add "-youbi"

Monday                         getsuyoubi                 'Moon day'
Tuesday                        kayoubi                    'Fire day'
Wednesday                      suiyoubi                   'Water day'
Thursday                       mokuyoubi                  'Wood day'
Friday                         kinyoubi                   'Gold day'
Saturday                       doyoubi                    'Earth day'
Sunday                         nichiyoubi                 'Sun day'

(pronounce "ou" as a long "o" vowel)
